features: HYDRATION WITHOUT HEAVINESS: Moisturize & refresh with a touch of the tropics. Infused with hibiscus water, passionfruit & juicy watermelon, this refreshing shampoo will help keep hair feeling, looking & smelling fresh without residue or heaviness

REFRESH & NOURISH: Quench parched hair with lightweight hydration & refreshing, tropical scent. Blended with antioxidant-rich passionfruit, vitamin-packed watermelon & exotic hibiscus water. Suitable for all hair types & safe for color-treated hair

PURE COCONUT WATER: We start with a unique blend of aloe vera juice infused with pure coconut water, unlike other products that start with deionized water as their first ingredient. Our results? Moisturized strands & a healthy glow with every use

HEALTHY HAIR FOR ALL TYPES: Maui Moisture has lines of shampoos, conditioners, hair oils, masks, skin care & styling products for all different hair & skin types, from straight to curly, from normal to oily, to help get hair & skin looking healthy

TRY MAUI MOISTURE if you've used products by Pureology, Head & Shoulders, Kerastase, Paul Mitchell, Batiste, Biolage, Pantene, Redken, Oribe, Loreal, Herbal ssences, TreSemme, Matrix, Bumble & Bumble, Biolage, Bed Head, Deva Curl, Living Proof
body.description: Looking for lightweight hydration? Let us lead you to our Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo. With exotic hibiscus water, lush passion fruit, and juicy watermelon, this blend is perfect for easily weighed down, low porosity hair as well as an instant transportation to endless summers. Maui Moisture starts with a unique blend with aloe vera juice and is infused with pure coconut water, unlike some other hair products that start with deionized water as their first ingredient listed. The results? Moisturized strands, mended split ends and a healthy glow with every use. Uncover soft, smooth and weightless strands with Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water collection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Shampoo + Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 Fl Oz Looking for lightweight hydration? Let us lead you to our Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo. With exotic hibiscus water, lush passion fruit, and juicy watermelon, this blend is perfect for easily weighed down, low porosity hair as well as an instant transportation to endless summers. Maui Moisture starts with a unique blend with aloe vera juice and is infused with pure coconut water, unlike some other hair products that start with deionized water as their first ingredient listed. The results? Moisturized strands, mended split ends and a healthy glow with every use. Uncover soft, smooth and weightless strands with Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water collection. Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz Stop choosing between styled curls and healthy-looking curls! You can have them both. Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse gives you a nice and shiny, flake-free hold without drying out your locks. With 100% aloe vera as the first ingredient, this product was made to quench your hair and give it the nourishment and softness it needs with an infusion of coconut milk and mango butter. This vegan, silicone-free blend helps keep frizz at bay and coils hydrated and crunch-free. Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Shampoo + Conditioner to Hydrate and Detangle Tight Curly Hair, Softening Shampoo, Vegan, Silicone & Paraben-Free, 13 Fl Not all moisture is the same! Take away lackluster curls and leave room for luscious, hydrated hair with Maui Moisture Curl Quench Coconut Oil Curl-Defining Shampoo. The hydrating formula of this anti-frizz shampoo helps smooth and defrizz curls while enhancing softness and body. Ideal for tight curls, the paraben-free, vegan shampoo is safe for use on color-treated hair and helps to detangle, protect and define your hair's natural curl pattern leaving behind shiny, bouncy curls. The rich blend contains 100% aloe vera as the first ingredient along with coconut oil, plumeria extract and papaya extract. Plus, the divine coconut water, white orange and tonka bean scent leaves locks smelling irresistibly good. This sulfate-free surfactant haircare system is vegan, free from silicones, parabens and mineral oil and contains no synthetic dyes. For a full hair care routine, pair this hydrating anti-frizz shampoo with Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Conditioner, Curl Milk and Curl Smoothie.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lightweight shampoo
reviews.reviewText: I was constantly weighing down my hair with other products. I have fine hair (not thin) and it seemed like over the years I lost that natural wave and slight curl and I kept thinking I was losing hair or my hair was changing. In reality I was just using shampoo and conditioners that didn't work for me and were weighting down my hair immensely. I bought this shampoo and conditioner set for its lightweight moisture since I believed through trial and error I didn't need anything heavy on my hair anymore, and low and behold I got my curls and waviness back! This is the perfect shampoo and conditioner I was looking for. It smells great, still makes my hair soft but doesn't weigh it down, and has given body and volume back to my hair! I love this stuff

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing smelling shampoo for fine long wavy/curly hair that doesn't weigh it down!
reviews.reviewText: I have long dry wavy/curly hair in between a 2B-2c. My roots and the hair to about my ear level is virtually straight, however, and actually gets greasy if I don't wash my hair least every two days or so. This shampoo not only smells like a juicy watermelon candy that gets me excited to wash my hair, but also really cleans the scalp so well without leaving buildup and residue. This shampoo also does not dry out the rest of my hair and the ends, and leaves my hair detangled and ready for conditioner. I can tell when "moisturizing" shampoos are actually drying because my hair gets so tangled when coming through it in the shower (coughPatterncough), and this one does not dry my ends out! It's really hard to find a good middle ground shampoo that doesn't break the bank and cleans my scalp without damaging the ends, so this is probably my holy grail! If I heatstyle my hair, I leave it for like 4-5 days without washing, so this $8 shampoo bottle will sometimes last me 5 months!Note: I do not use the corresponding conditioner so don’t know if it’s any good. As I have dry hair, I like to splurge on intensive hydrating conditioners. Also, the bottle cap is kind of cheap, so use caution when traveling with this.

reviews.reviewerName: i would not recommend this even if you want a cheap straightener since it doesn’t clamp down all the way so it’s hard to get all your hair straight.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this is an amazing shampoo leaves your hair so soft and smells amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Watch for sizes
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these and didn’t realize they were much smaller than the ones at Walmart and the exact same price. But that was my fault. This is still a great smelling and working product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hair has never been softer!
reviews.reviewText: After years of improperly caring for my hair, I've only just recently started putting effort into it. I've been trying all kind of shampoo and conditioners, but nothing was working. I have VERY thin and fine curly hair, so finding a curly hair product that doesn't weigh it down and make me look like smeagol was hard. Until I found this! My hair has been so soft and hydrated, my curls have never looked better.Pros:+ Great long lasting scent+ Very hydrating+ Perfect for thin & fine hairCons:None!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is good stuff
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR: this stuff works just as well as salon brand shampoo and conditioner. I have long, straight, fine hair down to my hips and have had no problems using the shampoo and conditioner from Maui.I have two sisters who work in a high end hair salon (DC area; lots of wives of senators and one sister of a very famous actress are among the clientele) and they give me salon brand products for free. One of the perks of having family in the business; I haven’t had to buy expensive hair products in years. Well, due to Covid the salon was shut down for a while and I ran out of my fancy and expensive haircare items I had gotten used to getting for free. I bought this shampoo and conditioner due to the reviews that seemed good enough to go ahead and buy. I had been spoiled by getting free hair products for so long that I didn’t want to splurge and spend my own money on the expensive stuff that I had grown used to and figured I’d be fine using cheap stuff until the salon reopened. I was surprised at how well this brand worked for me. I know that a lot of the time you’re paying for the brand so it’s not like the salon and stuff was doing anything miraculous that I didn’t think cheaper stuff would be able to do but I have had drugstore shampoo and conditioner cause sores on my head and leave my hair gross and greasy. The hibiscus shampoo and conditioner maintain my healthy hair and make it easy to comb through and doesn’t leave it greasy, weighed down, brittle, or sores on my head. I have gone through more than one bottle of both shampoo and conditioner from this brand and I believe that it will be a good product for anyone who has similar hair to myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was disappointed with this product, it left my hair dry. Smelled nice but can’t use it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Estaba busando un shampoo que no fuera tan pesado y me dejara bien el cabello y lo encontre, cuando lo use pense que no iba hacer nada de espuma pero oh sorpresa si la hace y no se necesita mucha cantidad, tengo el cabello largo rizado y me lo dejo súper bien, liviano, nada grasoso y tambien note que tuve menos caida de cabello que con mi shampoo regular, entonces la verdad 9 de 10 ... eso por el precio y la cantidad ya que para comprarlo seguido si sale carito pero por la calidad creo lo vale, lo compre en oferta entonces hay que estar cazando cuando tenga descuento
Thank you so muchIt’s a fast service.I’m so happy with this seller.

Limpia muy bien el cuero cabelludo. No reseca el cabello como otros shampoos. Desde el primer uso mi cabello se sintió mejor, menos maltratado. No es un shampoo que nutra pero es un shampoo que no maltrata. Con los shampoos convencionales mi cabello quedaba como plástico y con este se siente normal, suave y brillante. No baja el volumen natural de mi cabello. El olor no dura mucho.
